Posts.Content: May 6, 2014 10:21AM Madish wrote: Thanks GraceB1 I was given little info by docs and thought I would be back to work in a week. How long do others usually stay on the RX painkillers and will I have to live with the pain of the iron bra until       reconstruction is done?
Posts.Title: Single mastectomy on April 16 Madish sarahjane7374

Posts.Content: Madish wrote: Hi ladies I am looking for advice on whether I am felling is normal. I am 3 weeks post op  and am weaning myself off the perks but am an emotion wreck. I Had a single mastectomy with a TE. No rad or chemo necessary. The pain is not sever it is just a dull uncomfortable ache. I fell like there is a curved bar from the top of my armpit  around to the bottom that is always uncomfortable and cutting in to me. My arm is most comfortable with my hand on my waist. I felt better on the perks but I hate the way they make me feel and just came off a weekend of hot and cold flashes  and a bunch of other  symptoms which I swear was withdrawal and the constipation is not bearable though I live on a variety of softener s and laxatives. I am fatigued and emotional weak. I had a small fill the other day and felt my chest compressed with a small amount of trouble  breathing. I swear the liquid went underneath my armpit. Normal? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Single mastectomy on April 16 Madish sarahjane7374
